item.title: 票务平台 StubHub 8 亿美元首次公开募股后高开 7.9
item.description: StubHub Holdings Inc. 的股价在开盘交易中上涨了 7.9%，此前该票务平台在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 8 亿美元，其定价处于市场定价范围的中间位置。【原文：StubHub Holdings Inc. shares rose 7.9% in their opening trade after the ticketing platform raised $800 million in its US initial public offering that priced in the middle of its marketed range.】

item.title: Dollarama 被誉为 "加拿大的 Costco"，伯恩斯坦将其评级为 "跑赢大盘"。
item.description: Dollarama Inc.是加拿大的一家折扣零售商，其股价今年飙升了 35%，获得了 Bernstein 分析师马志汉的高度评价，并被冠以 "难以辜负 "的称号。【原文：Dollarama Inc., the Canadian discount retailer whose shares have surged 35% this year, earned high praise — and a moniker that’ll be tough to live up to — from Bernstein analyst Zhihan Ma.】

item.title: 温克艾沃斯的 "双子座 "空间站下滑，跌破首次公开募股价格
item.description: 双子座空间站公司（Gemini Space Station Inc. 股价周三扩大跌幅，在作为美国上市公司上市后的几天内跌破其初始发行价，追随一些加密货币相关股票走低。【原文：Gemini Space Station Inc. shares extended declines Wednesday to fall below its initial offering price within days of debuting as a public company in the US, tracking some cryptocurrency-related stocks lower.】

item.title: 加纳央行大幅降息出乎意料
item.description: 加纳央行下调关键利率的幅度超过预期，因为预计通胀将大幅放缓，并在年底前回到目标区间。【原文：Ghana’s central bank lowered the key interest rate more than expected as inflation is expected to significantly slow and return to its target range by year-end.】

item.title: 谷歌计划合作打击未经同意的图像
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司计划开始与 StopNCII 合作，后者是一家非营利组织，致力于防止未经同意的图片在网上传播。对于倡导者来说，此举标志着这家搜索巨头在打击基于图像的侵权行为方面迈出了重要一步，尽管这一步早该迈出。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google plans to start working with StopNCII, a nonprofit that helps prevent the spread of nonconsensual images online. For advocates, the move marks a significant, albeit overdue, step in the search giant's efforts against image-based abuse.】

item.title: Garmin更新部分中端智能手表，主推高端产品
item.description: Garmin 有限公司周三推出了几款面向主流消费者的中档手表，此前几周，该公司还更新了一款价格较高的专业运动手表。【原文：Garmin Ltd. on Wednesday introduced several mid-tier watches aimed at mainstream consumers, weeks after refreshing one of its more expensive specialty sports models.】

item.title: 阿根廷比索突破交易限制，颠覆米莱外汇策略
item.description: 阿根廷比索周三暴跌，首次突破了政府设定的交易区间，并有可能使政府控制通货膨胀和增加外汇储备的政策陷入混乱。【原文：The Argentine peso slumped on Wednesday, breaching the trading band set by the government for the first time and threatening to throw its policies to control inflation and build up foreign currency reserves into disarray.】

item.title: 热带风暴 "加布里埃尔 "在大西洋形成，打破干燥天气
item.description: 在大西洋连续几周异常平静之后，热带风暴加布里埃尔在加勒比群岛以东形成。【原文：Tropical Storm Gabrielle has formed well to the east of the Caribbean islands after the Atlantic has been unusually quiet for weeks.】

item.title: Reddit 寻求与谷歌、OpenAI 达成下一个人工智能内容协议
item.description: Reddit 公司正在与 Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司就下一份内容共享协议进行早期谈判，旨在从未来的交易中获取更多价值，因为其数据在搜索结果和生成式人工智能训练中发挥着重要作用。【原文：Reddit Inc. is in early talks to strike its next content-sharing agreement with Alphabet Inc.’s Google, aiming to extract more value from future deals now that its data plays a prominent role in search results and generative AI training.】

item.title: 高盛为收购 Dayforce 准备 55 亿美元债务交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is reaching out to loan investors to gauge early interest for a highly-anticipated debt offering to help finance Thoma Bravo’s acquisition of human resources software provider Dayforce Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率下调至 2.5%，分析师认为未来将有更多宽松政策出台
item.description: 加拿大央行自 3 月份以来首次下调政策利率，符合市场和许多经济学家的预期。在经济增长疲软、求职者前景艰难的情况下，一些分析师认为央行还没有完成降息。【原文：The Bank of Canada cut its policy interest rate for the first time since March, matching the expectations of markets and many economists. With weak economic growth on the horizon and a tough outlook for job-seekers, several analysts believe the central bank isn’t done.】

item.title: 交易商消化美国环保署生物燃料提案，豆油收跌
item.description: 由于交易商消化了美国政府根据生物燃料掺混要求重新分配豁免量的建议，豆油期货创下一周来最大跌幅。【原文：Soybean oil futures fell the most in a week as traders digested US government proposals to reallocate exempted volumes under biofuel blending requirements.】

item.title: 据说 EQT 正在权衡收购校车公司 First Student 的方案
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，EQT AB 正在权衡各种选择，包括为该私募股权公司支持的学生交通公司 First Student Inc.【原文：EQT AB is weighing options including a US IPO for First Student Inc., a student transportation company backed by the private equity firm, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国消费者信用评分以金融危机以来最快速度下降
item.description: 美国消费者信用评分出现了自 2009 年全球金融危机以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Consumer credit scores in the US saw their biggest drop since the fallout from the global financial crisis in 2009.】

item.title: 华尔街将对冲基金钟爱的加密货币赌注变成 ETF 诱饵
item.description: 华尔街正在将一种久经考验、值得信赖的加密货币交易重新包装成 ETF，赌新一代散户投资者希望参与这种深受机构专业人士喜爱的套利策略。【原文：Wall Street is repackaging a tried-and-trusted crypto trade into an ETF, betting that a new generation of retail investors want in on an arbitrage strategy beloved by institutional pros.】

item.title: 微软与挪威达成60亿美元人工智能计算能力租赁协议
item.description: 微软公司将支付 62 亿美元租用挪威的人工智能计算能力。【原文：Microsoft Corp. will pay $6.2 billion to rent AI computing power in Norway.】

item.title: 迈克-梅奥（Mike Mayo）对大银行交易回升持乐观态度
item.description: 资本募集的复苏正在刺激华尔街最大的牛市之一。富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：A resurgence in capital raising is pumping up one of Wall Street’s biggest bulls. Wells Fargo & Co.’s Mike Mayo hiked his price targets for some of the largest US lenders with a prediction that activity would hit record levels this year and next.】

item.title: 纽约市社区投票后，凯撒的时代广场赌场竞标告终
item.description: 周三，社区咨询委员会成员在一次关键投票中否决了在曼哈顿时代广场开设赌场的项目，至此，该项目竞标结束。【原文：The bid for a casino in Manhattan’s Times Square has ended after members of a community advisory committee voted down the project in a key vote Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会将投票决定将对冲基金信息披露截止日期推迟至 2026 年 10 月
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）将就对冲基金披露要求推迟至 2026 年 10 月进行表决，这将是该行业对拜登时代规定的又一次突破。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission will vote on a delay to hedge fund disclosure requirements to Oct. 2026, delivering what would be another break for the industry from the Biden-era rules.】

item.title: 贝莱德 1,850 亿美元模型制造商正加大股票押注力度
item.description: 根据彭博社的一份投资展望，全球最大的资产管理公司正在 "加大风险"，在其价值 1850 亿美元的模型投资组合平台上加倍投资美国股票和人工智能。【原文：The world’s biggest asset manager is “turning up the risk dial” by doubling down on US equities and artificial intelligence exposure across its $185 billion model-portfolio platform, according to an investment outlook viewed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 以色列股市延续跌势，创 18 个月来最长连跌纪录
item.description: 由于投资者越来越担心加沙战争对经济的影响，以色列股市的下挫已持续到第六天，是 18 个月以来持续时间最长的一次。【原文：The selloff in Israeli stocks stretched into a sixth day, the longest run in 18 months, with investors increasingly concerned about the economic impact of the war in Gaza.】

item.title: 五角大楼约 500 名网络操作员接受监察机构审查
item.description: 根据政府问责局周三发布的一份报告，五角大楼庞大的网络行动涉及约 500 个组织和 7 万多名人员，这些数字预示着有可能出现代价高昂的重叠和低效现象。【原文：The Pentagon’s sprawling cyber operations involve about 500 organizations and more than 70,000 personnel, numbers that signal significant potential for costly overlap and inefficiency, according to a report from the Government Accountability Office released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国计划提名财政部丹-卡茨为国际货币基金组织二号官员
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府计划提名财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的幕僚长丹-卡茨（Dan Katz）担任国际货币基金组织的二号官员。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration plans to nominate Dan Katz, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s chief of staff, to be the International Monetary Fund’s No. 2 official, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟将与英国、加拿大就 1,500 亿欧元基金展开会谈
item.description: 欧盟成员国批准了与加拿大和英国的谈判，这将使它们能够获得该集团旨在加速国防工业投资的 1,500 亿欧元（1,780 亿美元）基金。【原文：European Union member states approved negotiations with Canada and the UK that would give them access to the bloc’s €150 billion ($178 billion) fund aimed at accelerating investment in the defense industry.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率下调至 2.5%，在风险中 "谨慎 "前行
item.description: 由于美国关税对经济和劳动力市场造成了损害，加拿大央行下调了利率，但对未来货币宽松政策的路径保持缄默。【原文：The Bank of Canada cut interest rates as the economy and labor market show damage from US tariffs, but kept tight-lipped on any future path for monetary easing.】

item.title: 交易员暂停股市反弹，等待美联储重要决定
item.description: 周三早盘，美国股市走势徘徊，华尔街在美联储今天下午降息的预期基本达成之前保持不动。【原文：US equities meandered early Wednesday as Wall Street stayed put ahead ahead of a largely-expected Federal Reserve interest rate cut this afternoon.】

item.title: 纽约高管抨击州政府人才流失和监管 "黑洞
item.description: 希瑟-布里切蒂-穆里根（Heather Briccetti Mulligan）在最近一次与纽约高管的圆桌会议上回忆了一位商人的挫败感，他将申请一个价值 2 亿美元的建筑项目的许可证与订购比萨饼相提并论。【原文：At a recent roundtable with New York executives, Heather Briccetti Mulligan remembers the frustration of a businessman who compared trying to file a permit for a $200 million construction project with ordering a pizza.】

item.title: 美国黄油过剩导致价格跌至三年低点
item.description: 过去几年，随着美国人对黄油的胃口越来越大，乳制品行业转而饲养产奶量更高的奶牛，并扩建设施以满足需求。他们可能做得太过分了。【原文：As America’s appetite for butter grew over the past few years, the dairy industry turned to cows that produce fattier milk and expanded facilities to meet the demand. They might have gone too far.】

item.title: 预期美联储降息前国债收益率接近一周低点
item.description: 随着投资者对周三美联储利率决定的倒计时，国债收益率维持在本周最低水平附近。【原文：Treasury yields held near their lowest levels this week as investors counted down to Wednesday’s Federal Reserve interest-rate decision, which is expected to be the first cut in 2025.】

item.title: 据说布鲁克菲尔德的 Rockpoint Gas Storage 将考虑在多伦多上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）的北美天然气存储平台 Rockpoint Gas Storage 正在考虑在加拿大进行首次公开募股。【原文：Rockpoint Gas Storage, Brookfield Asset Management’s North American natural gas storage platform, is weighing an initial public offering in Canada, according to people familiar with the matter.】
